project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python quiz game that presents multiple-choice questions to the user, keeps track of their score, and displays it at the end.

task.name: Define the structure for quiz questions and answers
Implement the function to ask questions and get user input
Display final score to the user
Write unit tests for the quiz functionality
Execute tests on the quiz game to ensure all functionality works correctly
